title: Step 32

challengeFiles.name: index
styles

tests.text: You should give .penguin-body a width of --fcc-expected--, but found --fcc-actual--.
You should give .penguin-body a height of --fcc-expected--, but found --fcc-actual--.
You should give .penguin-body a background of linear-gradient(45deg, rgb(134, 133, 133) 0%, rgb(234, 231, 231) 25%, white 67%).

description: Target the .penguin-body element, and give it a width of 53%, and a height of 45%. Then, set the background to a linear gradient at 45deg, rgb(134, 133, 133) from 0%, rgb(234, 231, 231) from 25%, and white from 67%.
